resources.string: the module master switch(takes effect after rebooted)

After the module was started,click the dot on the left side of the navbar or slide the left navbar，then you can call the shortcut menu，slide the right navbar，then you can call the music controller. \n\nIt can be used by the model with navbar，and the module was just be tested in the android and CM ROM，part of functions may not work in other ROMs，If the“system interface stops running” recurred after the module was activated that makes the phone doesn\'t work，please connect your phone to the computer and use the adb instructions“adb uninstall com.egguncle.xposednavigationbar”and then uninstall it。

\n\nwhen the android6.0 use expandSettingsPanel to drop-down the notification，it can be very slow to expand the animation，granting the system interface with root permission can solve this problem，conversely, it will not affect other functions.
Please click the word to leave a message in the review area or mark the module if you have any suggestions and comments,also can click button to donate,your support is the biggest drive for me. \n

click the dot on the left side of the navbar or slide the left navbar，then you can call the shortcut menu，slide the right navbar，then you can call the music controller. 
 It can be used by the model with navbar，and the module was just be tested in the android and CM ROM，part of functions may not work in other ROMs，If the“system interface stops running” recurred after the module was activated that makes the phone doesn't work，please connect your phone to the computer and use the adb instructions“adb uninstall com.egguncle.xposednavigationbar”and then uninstall it。 

 It also can work on Nougat with Xposed for N，now I just test it on Mokee.
Github: https://github.com/EggUncle/XposedNavigationBar \nCan you give me a star?ヾ(●゜▽゜●)♡

About open source 
Xposed: https://github.com/rovo89/Xposed 
litepal: https://github.com/LitePalFramework/LitePal 
gson: https://github.com/google/gson 
HideableNavBar: https://github.com/ztc1997/HideableNavBar
choose "add" button to add new functions，long press and drag the list to adjust order，click the "save" button in the upper right corner to save it。
ten shortcuts at most on one page (╯°Д°）╯︵ /(.□ . \)
the dot in the main navbar
please choose the shortcut which needs add
please choose the shortcut which needs delete
If the apps was frozen in the icebox，please grant root permission，and the module will run pm enable packageName to thaw the operation。
Change language success , please reboot app.
custom adb shell is not safe，if you do not know how to use adb shell，please do not use this function.
hook Nav Bar with horizontal screen
there maybe a little problem , please try to reboot.
